attributes.action: Leave EU campaign leaders to be scrutinised for lying to the electorate.
attributes.additional_details: The politicians involved should be held to account for their deceit of the voting public by the Electoral Commission and the body for Standards in Public Life.
attributes.background: Lies were told and false claims made by the leaders of the Leave  campaign, which were retracted immediately after the referendum was won.

rejection.details: Both the Electoral Commission and the Committee for Standards in Public Life are independent bodies.
